knimeNode.name: Calculate Properties
knimeNode.shortDescription: Calculates various properties of a set of molecules.

fullDescription.intro: Calculates various physico-chemical properties, lead- or drug-likeness related parameters, various atom and ring counts, molecular shape, flexibility and complexity as well as indications for potential toxicity.
fullDescription.option: The column containing the molecules used for the property calculation

ports.inPort: Input table containing the molecules for which properties should be calculated
